title: Install Boot-Repair in Ubuntu
description:
Ubuntu boot-repair can be used to fix a broken grub install for any distro if you have access to an Ubuntu live ISO.
Steps to install boot-repair:

- boot the Ubuntu live ISO or an Ubuntu install
- connect to the Internet
- open a new Terminal, then type the following commands (press Enter after each line):
```bash
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:yannubuntu/boot-repair
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y boot-repair && boot-repair
```
